      • applyUpgrade

        public boolean applyUpgrade(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                            Upgrade upgrade)
        Applies upgrade for target entity automatically increments current tier
        参数:
        entity - target entity
        upgrade - upgrade to apply
        返回:
        true if applied successfully, false if tier is max and cannot be applied more
